## Contract

**Input:** NEP (net ecosystem production, gC/m2/yr), Area of protected forest (m2), price of carbon ($/gC), total years from (years), Discount Rate (%).

**Modules:**
- Computer Total Annual Carbon Sequestered 
- Compute Present Value
- Compute Current Value

**Output:** Net present value of carbon sequestered ($)
